name: Merit Incentives
description:
Merit is a global engagement technology and solutions company assisting businesses to increase customer and employee engagement, via a suite of innovative cloud-based SaaS platform. enterprise solutions, applications and software. 

These technology and solutions are supported by a unique API-centric application providing its own merchant network with 6,000+ brands across 150+ countries - including 800+ retailers and merchants in the GCC alone - including rewards, digital gift cards, merchandise, offers & discounts, entertainment, travel incentives, mobile top-ups, making it a company that delivers on its promise of ‚Äòthinking globally, acting locally‚Äô.

enrichement.description:
Merit is a global engagement technology and solutions company assisting businesses to increase customer and employee engagement, via a suite of innovative cloud-based SaaS platform. enterprise solutions, applications and software. 

These technology and solutions are supported by a unique API-centric application providing its own merchant network with 6,000+ brands across 150+ countries - including 800+ retailers and merchants in the GCC alone - including rewards, digital gift cards, merchandise, offers & discounts, entertainment, travel incentives, mobile top-ups, making it a company that delivers on its promise of ‚Äòthinking globally, acting locally‚Äô.
enrichement.description_enriched: Merit Incentives is a global provider of engagement technology, specializing in delivering innovative and effective incentive programs that drive stakeholder loyalty and retention.
enrichement.description_metadata_raw: Seamless, API-driven solutions connecting you to a global network of 7,000+ brands, enabling real-time, instant gratification across 155+ countries.
categories_and_keywords: computers electronics and technology > programming and developer software (in united states)

company_updates.description:
üåç At Merit, sustainability is integrated into the way we work. 

We‚Äôre proud to have our efforts recognized by EcoVadis, one of the world‚Äôs most respected providers of business sustainability ratings.

This recognition reflects our commitment to minimizing environmental impact, advancing fair and inclusive practices, ensuring transparency in our operations, and partnering with organizations that share our values.

We see this as encouragement to continue setting higher standards and driving responsible growth.

https://lnkd.in/dt3zTxcX 

#BronzeMedal #Sustainability #ResponsibleBusiness #Merit

[ LOYALTY & TECHNOLOGY ]

4 key themes at #LoyaltyAndAwards and the conference starts strong with Loyalty & Technology.

üé§ Mehdi Hemici presenting Accor‚Äôs mobile-first strategy and how it smoothes the customer experience
üé§Bahadƒ±r Durak, from Pegasus Airlines debating the limits of AI compared to human expertise
üé§ Kim Hardaker sharing Riyadh Air | ÿ∑Ÿäÿ±ÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ±Ÿäÿßÿ∂‚Äôs strategy to digitalise their customer journey, well timed just after their program launch

In addition, Merit Incentives, Riyadh Air | ÿ∑Ÿäÿ±ÿßŸÜ ÿßŸÑÿ±Ÿäÿßÿ∂, Radisson Hotel Group, Kobie and Loyalty Juggernaut will share their results with new technologies so far, working solutions and bitter failures.

Finally, SAS - Scandinavian Airlines, Eurowings Digital and Meli√° Hotels International will share their wishes what they'd like to see to come to live in the technology space and the 3 shortlisted top suppliers of the Golden Loyalty Awards will get on stage to share their latest projects.

Be in the room this October for these sessions and many more.

‚ö† Last day to register for EUR 499 before the price increases.

#agenda #GlobalFlight

üö® Exciting news! Once again, we're being considered for recognition on the global stage for our innovations in loyalty technology - being shortlisted for multiple categories at the Gift Card & Voucher Association (GCVA) Hall of Fame Awards 2025 ‚≠ê

üèÜ Best B2B Product or Service ‚Äì THANAA PEOPPL | Dolphin Energy
 A fully customised employee rewards platform designed to inspire, motivate, and engage teams with meaningful recognition.

üèÜ Best Industry Innovation ‚Äì Mastercard | SAB Points Exchange
 A groundbreaking cross-partner points exchange ecosystem that allows customers to seamlessly convert and redeem points across multiple brands, giving them more freedom and value than ever before.

These nominations are a reflection of the creativity, technical expertise, and relentless commitment of our team to reshape how loyalty is delivered and experienced.

Congratulations to everyone involved in building these programs ‚Äî your work continues to raise the bar for the industry.

Here‚Äôs to bringing home the silverware!

https://lnkd.in/eFKUrd9N

#GCVA #GiftCardIndustry #Innovation #IndustryAwards #AwardShortlisted #Merit

Mental wellbeing is more than just a nice-to-have - it‚Äôs a key driver of loyalty and performance.

Last week, our HR team attended From Empathy to Evidence: Measuring Mental Well-Being by MindPeers ‚Äî a powerful session designed for people leaders, focused on embedding mental health into company culture with measurable outcomes.

The session explored practical frameworks and real-world case studies on how organizations can move beyond surface-level wellness perks to build lasting cultural change. From tracking the right metrics to gaining leadership buy-in, it equipped attendees with the tools to turn wellbeing into a business priority.

At Merit we know that recognition doesn‚Äôt start with customers ‚Äî it starts with employees. When teams feel seen, supported, and psychologically safe, it reflects in how they innovate, collaborate, and show up for clients.

#Merit #People #Culture #Wellness

www.meritincentives.com

We‚Äôre proud to share that we have been shortlisted for two #awards at the European Loyalty Awards 2025!

üìåBest Use of Technology within a Loyalty Program - LiveWell by Zurich
üìåBest Loyalty Initiative within Travel, Leisure, Experience & Entertainment - SAB Points Exchange

These programs are making waves in the loyalty space ‚Äî redefining how technology, flexibility, and value come together to create meaningful user experiences.

A big shout-out to everyone who contributed to building and launching these initiatives, your work continues to stand out on an international stage!

https://lnkd.in/eXsXbVak

#EuropeanLoyaltyAwards #Merit #LoyaltyPrograms #CustomerExperience #Technology #Loyalty #Awards

Last week, our CEO & Co-founder,¬†Julie Barbier, shared practical insights on ‚ÄúDesigning a Scalable Fundraising Strategy‚Äù as part of the TikTok x Blossom SME Empowerment Program.

Julie‚Äôs session focused on the real challenges founders face when navigating funding, scaling smart, and building long-term momentum‚Äîand how every step of the journey matters.

Thank you to¬†TikTok¬†and¬†Blossom Accelerator¬†for hosting this empowering program and bringing together such a dynamic group of entrepreneurs and changemakers.

We're proud to be part of initiatives that uplift the startup community and share knowledge that fuels growth.

#TikTokxBlossom #Innovation #StartupJourney #Empowerment #SME #BlossomAccelerator #Entrepreneurship #Leadership #Merit #ScalingSmart

What a night at the Incentive Marketing Association Summit 2025 in Austin, Texas! 

We‚Äôre incredibly proud to share that Merit received two awards during this year‚Äôs event:

üèÜ Excellence in Incentive Travel ‚Äì for our SAB Points Exchange (PX) Program‚Äîin partnership with Mastercard

üèÜExcellence in Gift Cards ‚Äì for our collaboration on LiveWell by Zurich's transformative global gift card program.

These recognitions reflect the strength of our partnerships and the impact of our loyalty and incentive solutions across diverse industries.

A huge thank you to the Incentive Marketing Association for hosting an inspiring summit and bringing together such a passionate community of innovators. And of course, a special thank you to our amazing partners and team‚Äîthis wouldn‚Äôt be possible without your trust, creativity, and drive.
We‚Äôre honored to add more recognition to our journey and excited for what‚Äôs ahead!

https://lnkd.in/gQ37v8De

#IMAExcellenceAwards #IMASummit2025 #Merit #LoyaltyInnovation #IncentiveTravel #GiftCards #Awards2025 #AustinTexas

üåç Loyalty without borders.

Our clients don‚Äôt have to guess what their users want‚Äîbecause we offer what everyone wants: Choice. Flexibility. Convenience.

With 7,000+ brands, 63 currencies, and presence in 160+ countries, we‚Äôre redefining what global loyalty can look like.

#LoyaltyNetwork #Merit #B2B2C #EngagementEvolved #MeritMarketplace #MeritPX

We‚Äôre proud to officially announce the signature of the strategic partnership with SAUDI AIRLINES for the AlFursan Store.

This marks a major step forward in enhancing AlFursan‚Äôs loyalty offering - making rewards more accessible and relevant to members‚Äô everyday lives. Through the new platform, members will be able to redeem miles for a curated selection of digital and lifestyle products, adding more value, convenience, and flexibility to their journey.

A special thank you to the AlFursan and SAUDIA teams for their trust, collaboration, and vision in bringing this project to life-and to the Merit team for their dedication, expertise, and commitment throughout every stage.

Learn more about this milestone in our official press release.

https://lnkd.in/gYm6zzUC

#LoyaltyInnovation #Vision2030 #SaudiDigitalTransformation #CustomerExperience #AlFursan #Saudia #Partnership #ProudMoment #Entrepreneurship #Teamwork #Milestone #Merit

Are you measuring your loyalty program by new customers acquired?

It might be time to realign your focus. Loyalty programs are designed to deepen existing relationships, not just to attract new ones. 

Let's ensure our strategies reflect that.

Time to bust some myths üëá

Employee Engagement is so much more than offering cash to top performers, or high-cost programs with questionable ROI.

üß† Rethink what you think you know about employee rewards.
Cash ‚â† culture.

At Merit, we help businesses replace outdated incentives with Peoppl, offering real-time, flexible, and scalable engagement systems.

#EmployeeExperience #Peoppl #MythBusting #RewardStrategy #EngageBetter #Merit

The truth? Most loyalty programs fail because they‚Äôre built for the business‚Äînot the user.

We flip the model with our library of redemption modules and Points Exchange - making engagement intuitive, global, and high-impact.

From redemption pain to loyalty gain

üì¢ Exciting Milestone for Merit Incentives! üöÄ

I am thrilled to announce that we have successfully raised $28 million in our Series B funding round, led by Alistithmar Capital  and Tech Invest Com  with strong support from Endeavor Catalyst, Salica Investments and Stride Ventures .
This is a transformative step in our journey as we continue to disrupt engagement and loyalty solutions on a global scale.

Over the past few years, Merit has evolved from a regional player to a global leader, redefining how businesses connect with their customers, employees, and communities. Our mission has always been clear: to create innovative engagement solutions that drive behavior change and unlock value for all stakeholders.

This funding will accelerate our efforts in:
	‚Ä¢	üåç Expanding our footprint across key markets, including Saudi Arabia, the UAE, Egypt, and beyond.
	‚Ä¢	ü§ñ Advancing our technology infrastructure to launch new solutions 
	‚Ä¢	üõ†Ô∏è Enhancing our product offering with an Agent as a Service (AAAS) model, empowering businesses to seamlessly create, manage, and optimize engagement strategies through AI-driven tools.

I‚Äôm immensely grateful to our partners, investors, and the entire Merit team for their unwavering dedication to our vision. This achievement belongs to all of you. üôèüèΩ

To our clients, customers, and supporters: This is just the beginning. We‚Äôre here to help you unlock new growth opportunities through cutting-edge engagement and loyalty innovations.
